title: What the hell is wrong in LoL for Mac
body:
1 out of 10 games I play crashes. 
I haven't played for a while, yesterday I played a ranked and it crashed twice. Today when I connected SURPRISE SURPIRSE, Leaverbuster punishment. 5 minutes for 5 games...30 minutes afterwards I haven't connected yet, it will restart when going 00:00. RITO you kidding?

replies.body: I've been seeing a lot more posts about random crashing on Mac ever since the 4.21 patch. Maybe they're prepping for patch 5.1 or something.
